amendment.description: To require the Secretary of the Air Force to maintain 3 additional B-1 bomber aircraft, in addition to current fleet of 67 B-1 bomber aircraft, as an attrition reserve for the B-1 bomber aircraft fleet.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3328 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 3328 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Daschle. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To require the Secretary of the Air Force to maintain 3 additional B-1 bomber aircraft, in addition to current fleet of 67 B-1 bomber aircraft, as an attrition reserve for the B-1 bomber aircraft fleet.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3328 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Daschle.
